## Quaternion.RotationAxisToRef() method

Creates a rotation around an axis and stores it into the given quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationAxisToRef(axis: Vector3, angle: number, result: Quaternion): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the axis to use |
|  angle | <code>number</code> | defines the angle to use (in Euler degrees) |
|  result | <code>Quaternion</code> | defines the target quaternion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

the target quaternion
